attributes.action: change the day the clocks go backward from Sunday to Monday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Putting the clocks back on a Sunday gives the population an extra hour in bed on a Sunday, when people typically don't need it. If the clocks went backward on a Monday instead of a Sunday, people would have an extra hour in bed before work, which they would be appreciate far more, and which would make us all more productive during that particular week.
